headline: Jim Cramer Says The Kroger Co. (KR)’s Recession-Resistance Helped The Stock
summary: We recently published Jim Cramer Analyzed These 10 Stocks & Discussed Inflation. The Kroger Co. (NYSE:KR) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. The Kroger Co. (NYSE:KR)’s shares closed 1% higher the day this program was aired. The small magnitude of the move meant that broader market undercurrents, instead of firm-specific catalysts, had […]
